# Overlay

**Class**

An abstract base object that defines the methods and properties for map overlays.

## Declaration

```swift
abstract class Overlay extends MapKitEventTarget
```

## Overview

Overlays inherit from an abstract base object, [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Overlay], and share some common properties with [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Annotation] that allow you to control the visibility and interaction with the map in the same way. This object is abstract and you can’t instantiate it.

## Setting overlay options

- **data**: Custom data to associate with the overlay.
- **visible**: A Boolean value that determines whether an overlay is visible.
- **enabled**: A Boolean value that determines whether the overlay responds to user interaction.
- **selected**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the user selects the overlay.
- **style**: Style properties to apply to the overlay.
- **map**: The map you add the overlay to.

## Overlays

- **Adding interactivity to overlays**: Configure and respond to overlays to make them interactive.
- **Style**: A set of observable style properties for overlays, including the color and opacity of strokes and fills, and line styles.
- **CircleOverlay**: A circular overlay with a configurable radius that centers on a specific geographic coordinate.
- **PolylineOverlay**: An overlay of connected line segments that don’t form a closed shape.
- **PolygonOverlay**: An overlay consisting of one or more points that forms a closed shape.
- **OverlayOptions**: A dictionary of options that determines an overlay’s data, and indicates whether it’s visible, in an enabled state, and in a selected state.
- **TileOverlay**: An overlay that covers an area of the map with bitmapped tiles.
- **TileOverlayUrlTemplate**: A type that specifies the URL template for a tile overlay.

## Inherits From

- MapKitEventTarget

## Inherited By

- CircleOverlay
- PolygonOverlay
- PolylineOverlay
